eu.h2020.helios_social.extension.socialcommunitydetection

Class SocialCommunityDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.extension.socialcommunitydetection.SocialCommunityDetection

  • public class SocialCommunityDetection
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class used to manage the community detection module. Contains methods to start and stop the module, and methods to get the current community structure.
    Author:
    Andrea Michienzi (andrea.michienzi@di.unipi.it), Barbara Guidi (guidi@di.unipi.it), Laura Ricci (laura.ricci@unipi.it), Fabrizio Baiardi (f.baiardi@unipi.it)

      (package private) java.util.Map<eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node,java.lang.Boolean> status
      A map that keeps track of the status (online/offline) of the users It is initialized lazily, and populated as alters appear online

    • Method Detail

      • startModule

        public boolean startModule(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.ContextualEgoNetwork cen,
                           eu.h2020.helios_social.core.messaging.ReliableHeliosMessagingNodejsLibp2pImpl reliableHeliosMessagingNodejsLibp2p)
        Call this method to start the module. It is suggested not to call this method from a UI thread.
        Parameters:
        cen - The ContextualEgoNetwork on which the module should compute the community structure
        reliableHeliosMessagingNodejsLibp2p - An already correctly initialized ReliableHeliosMessagingNodejsLibp2pImpl. The id of the nodes in the ContextualEgoNetwork should be the same addesses used in ReliableHeliosMessagingNodejsLibp2pImpl.
        Returns:
        true if the module started correctly

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()
        Checks if this instance of the module has already been already started
        Returns:
        true if the module has been started and is now running

      • stopModule

        public boolean stopModule()
        Stops this instance of the module if it was running. Stopping the module will dispose all internal data structures: do not attempt to call getCommunities() after stopping the module.
        Returns:
        true if the module was successfully/gracefully stopped

      • getCommunities

        public java.util.List<Community> getCommunities(@NonNull
                                                eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context)
        Call this method to return the current community structure in the requested context. Only works if the module is running.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of which the community structure should be returned. This parameter cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the community structure. In case there is no community structure or the module is not running, returns null
